doc.previous: Bitan is known for boating and water sports Tamsui is a popular sea side resort town Ocean beaches are accessible in several directions from Taipei
doc.after: Taipei is rich in beautiful ornate temples housing Buddhist Taoist and Chinese folk religion deities The Longshan Temple built in 1738 and located in the Wanhua District demonstrates an example of architecture with southern Chinese influences commonly seen on older buildings in Taiwan
